root_causes.description: High volume of AR exceptions indicating potential data entry errors or system integration issues leading to inaccurate accounts receivable reporting.
Bank duplicates suggest inadequate reconciliation processes or system errors in transaction recording.
root_causes.financial_impact: Potential misstatement of cash balances due to duplicate transactions

remediations.action: Implement enhanced validation checks for AR entries and conduct a thorough review of integration points between systems to ensure data accuracy.
remediations.estimated_effort: 2 weeks with a team of 3 data analysts
remediations.success_criteria: Reduction in AR exceptions to below materiality threshold and improved data accuracy in subsequent periods.

remediations.action: Review and update bank reconciliation processes to include automated duplicate detection and resolution steps.
remediations.estimated_effort: 1 month with a team of 2 process analysts
remediations.success_criteria: Elimination of duplicate bank transactions in future reconciliations.
